overview: A wig shop next to the cancer hospital. Most of the customers here are cancer patients. Yang Shuai, a young barber with a negative attitude towards life, meets Gao Xue, a nurse who is suffering from pancreatic cancer. The two fall in love. In the last moments of Yang Shuai's life with Gao Xue, they find the meaning of survival and the truth, goodness and beauty of life.
title: Rushing to the Sea
